EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Additional Nomex®/ Kevlar® Information Required
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Additional Nomex® / Kevlar® Information Required
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex®/ Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®/ Kevlar® products.
We received an email from one of our DuPont website. In order to assist you better, please provide more information on the end use application, any product specifications you are looking to meet and a detailed description of the product that you are looking for. Also if manufacturing will not be in the US, what country will manufacturing will in?
Below is the web address for the Kevlar® Technical Guide. This guide provides product information and technical information. http://www2.dupont.com/Kevlar/en_US/assets/downloads/KEVLAR_Technical_Guide.pdf
Technical information can be found on our DuPont website in the Nomex® Technical Guide. Please refer to the web address below. http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/assets/downloads/nomex/Nomex_Technical_Guide.pdf
DuPont Protection Solutions
